name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? UK Edition
name_original: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? UK Edition
description:
Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? UK Edition is a game developed by Hothouse Creations. It was originally released in 2000. Eidos Interactive published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? UK Edition is available on PC.
